channel.title: Why dont any of my dropore procedures work?
channel.description: i have tryied 2 procedure they right click the ore but dont click drop how cna i fix this?.

item.title: Why dont any of my dropore procedures work?
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

This one works.

[code]Procedure LoadBitmaps;
Begin
Clay := BitmapFromString(4, 4, ‘86714C89734D8B7650907A52978’ +
‘1569781569A8357957E55A1895CA38B5D9F875B9C8559AC9262A8’ +
‘8F60A58D5FA1895C’);

OreMask := BitmapFromString(11, 11, ‘z78DA73730301033070436’ +
‘2238B60024C35B84CC0A5923C13F0BB937813F0EB22DE04CC5022’ +
‘CF04CADD404CC890EA0BFCE2F85D4E4C6A212FF470998FCC0600F’ +
‘B599CC1’);
End;

Procedure DropOres;
Begin
ClickAllItemsBmpMaskTolWait(‘rop’, OreMask, 20, 25, 30+Random(30));
ClickAllItemsBmpTolWait(‘rop’, Clay, 10, 30+Random(30));
End;[/code]

First, you have to make sure you load the bitmaps. So make sure you put LoadBitmaps; at the beginning of your main loop. Then just call the DropOres; procedure.

Read full topic
item.source: Why dont any of my dropore procedures work?
